media:group.media:title: Love Without Measure | Shelley Quinn
media:group.media:description:
What is the most important thing about you? What is love, and how can it be measured? Do you know that you are the object of Godâ€™s loveâ€”even if you have rejected Him? Presenting Bible truths of Godâ€™s love for all humanity andâ€”most especiallyâ€”for His covenant people, Shelley concludes that although we can know and experience Godâ€™s love, it remains for us immeasurable and unfathomable. Something can only be measured if there is a standard unit to which it can be compared. There is no human standard with which Godâ€™s love can be measured.
